description.originalText: Annabelle is wonderful, caring, responsible with a beautiful smile and heart ! We trust her completely and our boys love her.

I am recommending Annabelle, as an experienced (19yrs) early childhood teacher/parent running an indoor/outdoor EC school, HoneyTree Forest. Annabelle worked with us at our Prospect Park based Summer Camp as well as our at our HomeBase Program. She is a very cheerful intelligent, kind, highly capable caregiver for young children. She is by her nature a curious and very observant person. She can improvise an engaging story, age appropriate play-game or adventure. She can spin a good-tale, which keeps children captivated. She has a beautiful positive and exuberant energy which can be both soothing/calm and energetic. She is CPR and First Aid Trained. She is punctual and a very good communicator. Her love of children is palpable when working with her. She loves to discover their unique gifts and support them. I am delighted to recommend her.

description.displayText:
Annabelle is a gem! Smart, responsible, fun, athletic and warm. Both my children adored her. Both my son and daughter enjoyed countless hours after school with this wonderful human.

She truly is the perfect caretaker! I love her and wish my kids were still in need of a sitter sometimes. 

I would recommend her to anyone who needed childcare!

description.displayText: I have known Annabelle for a number of years. We are close family friends and now roommates. She is one of the most responsible, loving, and creative people I have ever met. She's incredibly reliable and always one I know I can count on. She also has one of the most vast imaginations I've come across. She can take any mundane afternoon and get everyone rallied around a big arts and crafts project or a lively round of monopoly. I've personally seen her with the children of the family she babysat for for many years. She listened closely to the ideas and needs of each of the children and took her role as caregiver extremely seriously. Annabelle is punctual, professional, caring, and most importantly, fiercely kind. I wish it had a babysitter like her when I was a child-and I am sure she will have a wonderful impact on the lives of whichever children she works with next. I would be happy to speak further about Annabelle's qualifications. I could sing her praises all day!
